condition.narrative: TKYB LA, Section I.A.1. The Borrower shall, throughout the implementation of its Respective Part of the Project, to thesatisfaction of the Bank maintain a Project Implementation Unit (“PIU”), and ensure that the PIU functions at all times in a mannerand with staffing and budgetary resources necessary and appropriate for the implementation of Part 2 of the Project.
TKYB LA, Section I.A.2. The Borrower shall, throughout the implementation of its Respective Part of the Project, comply with theapplicable prudential regulations of the Guarantor.

TKYB LA, Section I.AB.1 and 2. The Borrower shall maintain, throughout Project implementation, the Project Operations Manual(“POM”), in substance and manner acceptable to the Bank, and shall carry out its Respective Part of the Project, and cause the saidPart of the Project to be carried out, in accordance with the arrangements, procedures and guidelines set forth in the POM.

TKYB LA, Section I.C.1(a). For the purpose of carrying out its Respective Part of the Project, unless otherwise expressly agreed toby the Bank, the Borrower shall ensure that (i) the eligibility criteria and procedures for selecting PFIs, (ii) the terms andconditions for the Borrower's provision of Subsidiary Financing to PFIs, (iii) the eligibility criteria and procedures forselecting beneficiary SMEs, and (iv) the terms and conditions for the selected PFIs provision of Sub-financing to SMEs, acceptableto the Bank, including those set forth and/or referred to in the Annex to this Schedule 2, shall be included in the POM andfollowed.

TKYB LA, Section I.C.1(b). For the purpose of carrying out its Respective Part of the Project, unless otherwise expressly agreed toby the Bank, the Borrower shall provide that the amount of Subsidiary Financing extended to any single PFI not exceed theequivalent of USD 60,000,000, or such other amount agreed to by the Bank and set forth in the POM.

TKYB LA, Section I.C.2. After the collection from PFIs of at least USD 25,000,000 in Repayments or such amount as agreed to inwriting by the Bank, the Borrower shall (unless otherwise agreed to in writing by the Bank) utilize the principal Repayments fromthe first financing cycle to provide additional Subsidiary Financing to the same or other PFIs under Part 2 of the Project, whichthe PFIs shall use to extend additional Sub-financing to the same or other SMEs under Part 2 of the Project (“Reflows”) – for thesame purpose – for at least one additional financing cycle (on terms specified in the LA).

TKYB LA, Section I.D.1 and 2. The Borrower shall ensure that its Respective Part of the Project is carried out in accordance withthe Environmental and Social Standards and implemented in accordance with the Environmental and Social Commitment Plan (“ESCP”), ina manner acceptable to the Bank.

Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.1. Unless otherwise expressly agreed to by the Bank, the Borrower shall, throughout theimplementation of its Respective Part of the Project maintain a Project Implementation Unit (“PIU”) and ensure that the PIUfunctions at all times in a manner and with staffing and budgetary resources necessary and appropriate for the implementation ofPart 1 of the Project, acceptable to the Bank.
Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.A.2. The Borrower shall, throughout the implementation of its Respective Part of the Project,comply with the applicable prudential regulations of the Guarantor.

Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.B.1 and 2. The Borrower shall maintain, throughout Project implementation, the ProjectOperations Manual for its Respective Part of the Project (“POM”), in substance and manner acceptable to the Bank, and cause thesaid Part of the Project to be carried out, in accordance with the arrangements, procedures and guidelines set forth in the POM.

Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.C. 1. For the purpose of carrying out its Respective Part of the Project, and except as theBank shall otherwise agree, the Borrower shall: (a) on-lend at least 40 percent of Loan financing for its Respective Part of theProject to SMEs in Target Group 2 and a minimum combined 80 percent to SMEs in Target Groups 1 and 2; and (b) ensure that (i) thecriteria and procedures for selecting beneficiary SMEs and Subprojects, (ii) the terms and conditions for the Borrower's extensionof Sub-loans to beneficiary SMEs, shall be acceptable to the Bank, including those set forth and/or referred to in the Annex ofSchedule 2 to the LA, shall be reflected in the POM and followed.

Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.C.2. The Borrower shall utilize the principal repayments received from SMEs from the repaymentof Sub-loans to provide additional Sub-loans to the same or other SMEs under Part 1 of the Project in accordance with paragraph 1ofSection I.C of Schedule 2 to the LA.

Vakifbank LA, Schedule 2, Section I.D.1. The Borrower shall ensure that its Respective Part of the Project is carried out inaccordance with the Environmental and Social Standards, in a manner acceptable to the Bank, and implemented in accordance with theEnvironmental and Social Commitment Plan (“ESCP”), in a manner acceptable to the Bank.
